title: E-commerce
body: Developed a user-friendly e-commerce platform with secure authentication, intuitive navigation, and a smooth checkout process. Prioritized responsive design for optimal user experience across devices.

title: Learning Management System
body: Designed and implemented a Learning Management System (LMS) for seamless course management, user authentication, and an intuitive learning journey. Focused on simplicity and efficiency to enhance online education experiences

title: Tiny PHP MVC framework
body: Developed a lightweight and customizable PHP MVC (Model-View-Controller) framework for building web applications. The framework follows MVC architectural patterns to ensure separation of concerns and maintainability.
